message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $110. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very useful. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I understand its value to you, but I am only able to pay up to $90 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer but $90 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to go down to $95, but that's my final offer. If we can't agree on this price, I'll have to move on to other potential buyers.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I can only pay up to $88 for the product. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.
